page.title: 04SERVICES
page.content: The doctors' surgery is at Bellingham. Medicines have to be collected from the chemist there as the doctors are not allowed to dispense their own medicines. A district nurse visits patients in their homes when necessary and the health visitor sees mothers with babies and older people periodically. The nearest fire engine is at Bellingham. The part time firemen practice every Tuesday evening. The nearest police station is at Bellingham. We see the policemen travelling through by car or van and sometimes they visit us at school. At night the police have to come from Hexham.
